channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Social Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Social Widget

item.title: CVE-2023-0074|2024-08-02T04:54:32.804Z -- unknown -- wp%20social%20widget
item.description: The WP Social Widget WordPress plugin before 2.2.4 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
